title: Wildlife Special:Shark [BBC]
description:
FORMAT: DVD5 Full DVD
SYSTEM: PAL
LANGUAGES: 2.0: Spanish, English
SUBS: Spanish, English
ASPECT RATIO: 4:3

Genre: Documentary
Production Year: 2003 BBC
Country: United Kingdom.
Length: 50 min.


We discover what happens when one is the most known and fierce predator of the ocean, thanks to the Theft - shark, the last technology in the accomplishment of documentaries.

The Theft - shark is an animated shark created with systems developed by the industry of the theme parks. It takes a camera inserted in the nose and there is controlled across signs of subaquatic sounds, which allows that its behavior should have a level of very high realism.

The mission of the Theft - shark is to discover if the sharks are really killer machines, which behavior is handled by trigger chemists, or if they are the most intelligent and sophisticated creatures that the man has had the honor of knowing. Its revelations are extraordinary. We can enter the minds of the most dangerous sharks of the world and visualize by means of graphs what happens for its brains in the different situations. The answers are impressive.
